title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 2 - John Middlekauff
itunes:title: 08/27/2021 - HOUR 2 - John Middlekauff
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--looks into the future and likens Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers' possible post-Packers career trajectory to that of one NBA superstar, should the Packers not win a championship this coming season. What are Rodgers' best options after 2021? Doug expounds. Also, John Middlekauff--former NFL scout and host of the "3 and Out" podcast--joins Doug to chat about college football's powers jockeying for position as well as current storylines coming out of NFL training camps. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
